row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.PROMPTSET.PUSH_APPLICATION
row.description: Push an existing application to Cloud Foundry

row.xui: <dialog height="485" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Push application"><properties><entry name="text">Push application</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>
